title: Casshern Sins
synopsis: In a distant future, Earth has become a wasteland and humanity as we know it has died out. All that remains are sentient robots. They were supposed to be able to live foreverâ€”until the one called Luna died and the Ruin started. Their bodies will rust, and there is nothing that can be done to fix it. Now the robots are left only to contemplate their deaths, kept going only by the rumor that if they eat the one called Casshern, they will gain immortality.
voices: ['Furuya, Toru', 'Miyahara, Nami', 'Minaguchi, Yuko', 'Cho', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Akiya, Tomoko', 'Nakano, Yuto', 'Yajima, Akiko']
